alert.note: Alert for Adams; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 5:49PM EDT until July 18 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Adams County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Scioto County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 549 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Union, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... West Union, Peebles, Blue Creek, Rarden, Otway, Lombardsville, Dunkinsville, State Route 348 at State Route 125, Wamsley and Cedar Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
